text: Smarana karaa, yetiya allahe kitabisakalara paraa pratisrauti laichila ye, ‘arasye tomaloke iyaka manuhara ocarata spastabharae prakasa karaiba arau iyaka gopana nakaraiba’. Iyara pichato sihamte iyaka (agraahya karai) sihamtara pichaphale pela'i diye arau tuccha mulyata bikrai karae, gatike sihamte yito kraya karae seya kimana ye nikrsta
